channel.title: Getting global parameter types?
channel.description:
A while ago I finally figured out how to get the values of parameters in a patch to do preset morphing, but I was wondering whether the same was possible for the type and min/max-values of the parameters?
I want to add a randomise function to the preset-morphing, but currently this needs to be done in the code seperately for each patch.. making it impossible for me to create an universal randomise-preset module.

item.title: Getting global parameter types?
item.dc:creator: @SirSickSik Remco
item.description:
@SirSickSik wrote:

ah great! That will make me a very happy man then!
Who needs women if you got Johannes..

Read full topic

item.title: Getting global parameter types?
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

No, but expect this in the next release.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting global parameter types?
item.dc:creator: @SirSickSik Remco
item.description:
@SirSickSik wrote:

and ps...just for playing around with it in the meantime..

is there currently a piece of code to get the min/max values of parameters at all?

Read full topic

item.title: Getting global parameter types?
item.dc:creator: @SirSickSik Remco
item.description:
@SirSickSik wrote:

ah ok
Will it still be possible to get the values/types of parameters in other modules so I can still use this preset-morphing/randomisation?

Read full topic

item.title: Getting global parameter types?
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

Parameter meta-data organization is going to change in the next release, if you'd write code to do so, it is likely going to break in the next release.

Read full topic
